scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts Christ in the Sepulchre, shown with wounds from his crucifixion. He is seated within a sarcophagus, draped in a white cloth. Above and behind him, the instruments of the Passion are displayed against a red, patterned background. These include dice, a lantern, a hammer, tongs, a lance, a scourge, and a sponge on a reed. A column with a rope is also visible. The sarcophagus rests on a patch of green ground with sparse vegetation, and a dark shroud lies at its base.
